problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, the bisector of ∠ABC intersects the diagonal AC at point E, and CD at point M. It is known that BC = N_0, DM = N_1, and the area of ​​▱ABCD is N_2, then △ABE The area is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,▱ABCD的面积为28,∴AD=BC=2,AB∥CD,AB=CD,△ABC的面积=\frac{1}{2}×28=14,∴∠ABM=∠CMB,∵∠ABC的平分线为BM,∴∠ABM=∠CBM,∴∠CMB=∠CBM,∴MC=BC=2,∴AB=CD=MC+DM=5,∵AB∥CD,∴△ABE∽△CME,∴\frac{AE}{CE}=\frac{AB}{CM}=\frac{5}{2},∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupABE}}{S_{\bigtriangleupCBE}}=\frac{5}{2},∴△ABE的面积=\frac{5}{7}×14=10；故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的性质,等腰三角形的判定,相似三角形的判定与性质以及三角形的面积关系；熟练掌握平行四边形的性质,证明MC=BC和三角形相似是解决问题的关键．
